call_summary.final_outcome: The receptionist initiated a transfer to a specific staff member and the call ended immediately afterward.
call_summary.description: The caller, Jamie from Georgia Injury and Rehab Centers, requested to speak with a specific staff member regarding a case. The receptionist initiated the transfer and the call ended.

transfer_context.description: The receptionist stated they would transfer the caller to the requested staff member and the call disconnected immediately after.
